Name: La Bastille
Review Text: this place gets crazy late at night and is a place that amsterdam folks love to end up drinking and singing along to dutch drinking songs until early in the morning... good thing is they take bank cards so you can buy a few rounds of drinks for your work mates

Name: La Bastille
Review Text: Good bar for beers and music till late. You can dance and drink, but don't expect good DJs or anything fancy.
